content: That's a great idea! I think I'll go with the bruschetta and spinach and artichoke dip as appetizers. And for snacks, I'll prepare the popcorn with herbs and cheese and the fresh fruit and cheese platter. That should give my guests a nice variety of options before the main course. And, oh, by the way, I think I went to Walmart last Saturday with my family to stock up on some essentials. Do you think I could make it a habit to go grocery shopping on Saturdays?
